verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Immortal love, forever full, Forever flowing free, Forever shared, forever whole, A never ebbing sea!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our outward lips confess the name All other names above; Love only knoweth whence it came, And comprehendeth love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Blow, winds of God, awake and blow The mists of earth away: Shine out, O light divine, and show How wide and far we stray.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We may not climb the heavenly steeps To bring the Lord Christ down; In vain we search the lowest deeps, For Him no depths can drown.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: But warm, sweet, tender, even yet, A present help is He; And faith still has its Olivet, And love its Galilee.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The healing of His seamless dress Is by our beds of pain; We touch Him in life’s throng and press, And we are whole again.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Through Him the first fond prayers are said Our lips of childhood frame, The last low whispers of our dead Are burdened with His name.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: O Lord and master of us all, Whate’er our name or sign, We own Thy sway, we hear Thy call, We test our lives by Thine.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: The letter fails, the systems fall, And every symbol wanes; The Spirit over brooding all, Eternal love remains.
